c1.name: Symbiotic Creeper
c1.descriptionRaw: After <color=#FFD780FF>Razorgrass Blade</color> hits an opponent, it will regenerate 3.5 Energy for the Traveler.
c1.description: After Razorgrass Blade hits an opponent, it will regenerate 3.5 Energy for the Traveler.

c2.name: Green Resilience
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Lea Lotus Lamp</color>'s duration is increased by 3s.
c2.description: Lea Lotus Lamp's duration is increased by 3s.

c3.name: Whirling Weeds
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Razorgrass Blade</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Razorgrass Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Treacle Grass
c4.descriptionRaw:
After the <color=#FFD780FF>Lea Lotus Lamp</color> triggers a Lotuslight Transfiguration, it will obtain 5 stacks of the Overflowing Lotuslight effect from the Passive Talent "Verdant Overgrowth."
You must have unlocked this Passive Talent first.
c4.description:
After the Lea Lotus Lamp triggers a Lotuslight Transfiguration, it will obtain 5 stacks of the Overflowing Lotuslight effect from the Passive Talent "Verdant Overgrowth."
You must have unlocked this Passive Talent first.

c5.name: Viridian Transience
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Surgent Manifestation</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Surgent Manifestation by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Withering Aggregation
c6.descriptionRaw: The <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG Bonus</color> of the character under the effect of Overflowing Lotuslight as created by the <color=#FFD780FF>Lea Lotus Lamp</color> is increased by 12%. If the Lamp has experienced a Lotuslight Transfiguration previously, the character will also gain 12% DMG Bonus for the corresponding element.
c6.description: The Dendro DMG Bonus of the character under the effect of Overflowing Lotuslight as created by the Lea Lotus Lamp is increased by 12%. If the Lamp has experienced a Lotuslight Transfiguration previously, the character will also gain 12% DMG Bonus for the corresponding element.
